name: Corset Kimono Capsule
description: A fusion of Eastern elegance and Western structure. This exclusive capsule combines the fluidity of traditional kimono silhouettes with the structured sophistication of modern corsetry.

looks.name: Evening Elegance
looks.description: A dramatic evening ensemble featuring a structured corset bodice with flowing kimono sleeves

looks.name: Midnight Bloom
looks.description: Deep teal tones meet delicate floral embroidery in this statement piece

looks.name: Golden Hour
looks.description: Luxurious gold accents paired with minimalist black creates timeless sophistication

looks.name: Urban Chic
looks.description: Contemporary street style meets traditional craftsmanship for the modern fashionista

looks.name: Sunset Romance
looks.description: Warm earth tones and soft silhouettes create an effortlessly romantic aesthetic
